Name: Amaranthine
About the game: Amaranthine - is a dynamic horizontal scrolling shooter with elements of procedural generation. Travel through warp to the distant frozen planet that sent a distress signal. Features: Random level generation Loot system Precise mouse controls Big variety of enemies Legend mode with permanent death Endless gameplay
